result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sir Tony Valentino Conley

records.addlTxt:
11:22 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: C. Dillon via zoom, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Sir Tony Valentino Conley in court without counsel.  Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin. Includes 21CM92(STC), 22CF716 (INIT), & 22CM511 (STC).  Court reviews file and notes off record discussion with DE regarding status of an attorney, DE to send PD's office income information.  Court informs def of charges and reschedules this matter to conduct INIT when an attorney is present.  Court orders bond only.  DE verified address and updates phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 11:27 AM. bph
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on November 23, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

Includes 21CM92 and 22CM511.

- $250.00 bond posted on 22CM511. DE to post additional $250.00 prior to release. 

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, T.E.K. or N.E. except for Child Exchange through a 3rd party .  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
Status conference on October 31, 2022 at 11:15 am.

The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Status conference on October 31, 2022 at 11:15 am.

1:37 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Stephanie Schmidt in court. Defendant Sir Tony Valentino Conley in court, in custody. Includes 21CM92 and 22CM511 RW . Court reviews case. Atty Schmidt states DE qualifies. Bond argument. Court orders bond. Court sets STC. Adjourned 01:42 PM
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 11:15 am.
filed by DE providing proof DE was at work on the 13th of October which is why he missed court.   DE has court with EFV today at 11:00, clerk sent letter to EFV to review for SRN. bph     To gll
Statewide, signed by SRN on 10/14/22. bph

4:24 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Sir Tony Valentino Conley not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews file notes DE is not here, hall was called.  State requests warrant- body only statewide.  Court issues WARRANT- body only Statewide. Court reserves on bond, will stay on file pending motion.  Adjourned at 4:25 PM. bph

2:42 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Sir Tony Valentino Conley in court.  Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews file and notes DE does qualify for PD but needs to get them some information. Court reschedules matter to allow DE time to get information to PD's office and for them to appoint an atty. DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 2:48 PM. bph
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 04:15 pm.
Pre-trial conference on October 13, 2022 at 04:15 pm.

1:43 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Lindabaur. Prosecuting attorney Michael Becker appeared.  Jeremiah Harrelson appeared for Defendant for today. Defendant Sir Tony Valentino Conley in court, in custody. Includes 22CM511 INIT and 21CM92 RW. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights in 22CM511. Defendant understands. DE confirms address and DOB. Court questions non-appearance in 21CM92. DE states he was held up at work for over 24 hours. QUASH WARRANT in 21CM92. Bond argument; bond ordered. DE to contact PD to have Atty Petersen appointed in 22CM511.  gll
